author: rmuir
msg: LUCENE-4321: Don't extend the trappy/broken FilterReader and simplify CharFilter so subclasses are correct readers

author: psharples
msg: Fixed problem with the schema path for the digsig verification.  In a development setup the schema is nested down under the /src folder.  However, a release build (war, standalone etc) will not have a /src folder.  So updated the code to take a reference obtained from the servlet context, which gets a real runtime path, found under the WEB-INF folder.
